content:
I've added the new reminder for your lunch break.

**Reminder 4: Lunch Break (Monday to Friday, 12:30 PM)**
* Every Monday to Friday at 12:30 PM, you'll receive a reminder to take a break and grab some lunch.

Here's an updated summary of your reminders:

* Monday: 7:15 AM - Meditation Session, 12:30 PM - Lunch Break
* Tuesday: 12:30 PM - Lunch Break, 3:00 PM - Conference Call, 4:30 PM - Yoga Class
* Wednesday: 7:15 AM - Meditation Session, 12:30 PM - Lunch Break
* Thursday: 12:30 PM - Lunch Break, 3:00 PM - Conference Call
* Friday: 7:15 AM - Meditation Session, 12:30 PM - Lunch Break
* Saturday and Sunday: No reminders

You should now receive reminders for your meditation sessions, conference calls, yoga class, and lunch breaks throughout the week!
